issue.title: [Java] Replace google Preconditions with Arrow Preconditions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6118](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6118). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now in java code, most places uses `org.apache.arrow.util.Preconditions`, but still some places uses `com.google.common.base.Preconditions`.

Remove google Preconditions meanwhile remove duplicated checks.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6118?focusedCommentId=16899187) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4996
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4996>
